name: Bunny Crazy Run And Jump
description:
Bunny Crazy Run And Jump is an exciting, FREE endless running game for Boys and Girls of all ages. Bunny Crazy Run And Jump is specifically designed for children and families who want to enjoy and play with the coolest and cutest Looney Rabbit Bunnies in the world!

Features:
Fantastic running scenes
Run as far as you can
Comfortable sound effect
Easy to play
